mpm.loaders¶

Module contents¶

Item loaders for the mpm core.

Currently only ModItem items are loaded.

class mpm.loaders.ModItemLoader(item=None, selector=None, response=None, **context)¶

Bases: scrapy.contrib.loader.ItemLoader

Loader for ModItem objects
